description: TimeWarp.Nuru example manifest for MCP server dynamic discovery

examples.name: Basic TimeWarp.Nuru Application
examples.description: Basic TimeWarp.Nuru application with various route patterns including literals, parameters, and options

examples.name: Async Command Examples
examples.description: Demonstrates async command handlers with Task-based routes and async/await patterns

examples.name: Console Logging Integration
examples.description: Shows how to integrate Microsoft.Extensions.Logging with console output

examples.name: Serilog Integration
examples.description: Demonstrates Serilog integration with structured logging and trace-level output

examples.name: Mediator Pattern Implementation
examples.description: Shows how to use TimeWarp.Mediator for command handling with dependency injection

examples.name: Direct Delegate Routing
examples.description: Demonstrates direct delegate routing for maximum performance without DI overhead
